communication

Class Info

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.Info

  • public class Info
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is supposed to simplify the Communication between a Host and a Client, specifically to create a Jass-Turnier between devices with the NearbyAPI from Google.
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    Jauch

      • Info

        public Info(communication.Payload payload)
        Parameters:
        payload - Takes a received Payload and Constructs from its Data an Info-Object.

      • Info

        public Info(game.GameState nextState,
            byte[] byteArray,
            communication.DataType dataType)
        Parameters:
        nextState - Additional Information for the StateMachine implemented in Client and Host.
        byteArray - Contains the actual message, encoded in an Array of bytes.
        dataType - Specifies the Datatype, which the byteArray represents.
